thread.title: Comment on Court gives ex-minister Obanikoro seven days to settle defamation suit against Premium Times, Sahara Reporters by Obasalat
thread.title_full: Comment on Court gives ex-minister Obanikoro seven days to settle defamation suit against Premium Times, Sahara Reporters by Obasalat

author: Obasalat
title: Comment on Court gives ex-minister Obanikoro seven days to settle defamation suit against Premium Times, Sahara Reporters by Obasalat
text:
Alhaji Musiliu Obanikoro is a thief but I read in all newspapers that he took what does not belong to him and is under legal instruction to return almost 400 billion Naira to the treasury. What I want to know now is this: does the law of Nigeria say anyone who is still under legal directive to return what he took which does not belong to him is a man of impeccable reputation? I am amused. Obasalat 
IT IS 400 MILLION NAIRA DONâ€™T MAKE MUSILIU BANIKORO LOOK WORSE THAN HE IS. Rommel 
And what was the defamation suit about again pls, did he not receive money as the papers alleged? Search Our Stories Subscribe to News via Email
